%22%2C%22drools%22%3A%22%22%2C%22collectionAttribute%22%3Afalse%2C%22refId%22%3A%22%22%7D%5D", "AdvancedModeIndicator": false, "IsTestUser": false, "ReleaseState": "P" }

SELECT COUNT(distinct profile_id) AS unique_customers, SUM(profile_trans) AS total_offers, sum(eligible_revenue) as total_points, ceil(SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_offers_per_day, ceil(SUM(eligible_revenue)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_points_per_day, ceil((SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}})*{{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_offers, ceil((SUM(eligible_revenue)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}})*{{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_points FROM (
{{OFFERS_QUERY}} FROM T_ACT_TRANSACTION INNER JOIN T_ACT_TRANSACTION_DETAIL ON T_ACT_TRANSACTION.ACT_TRANSACTION_ID = T_ACT_TRANSACTION_DETAIL.ACT_TRANSACTION_ID INNER JOIN T_PRODUCT_CATALOG_FLAT ON T_ACT_TRANSACTION_DETAIL.ITEM_NUMBER = T_PRODUCT_CATALOG_FLAT.{{ITEM_NUMBER}} WHERE T_ACT_TRANSACTION.PROGRAM_CODE = :ProgramCode AND T_ACT_TRANSACTION.STATUS IN('A','P') and(T_ACT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE IN('PR', 'EP') OR(TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE IN('RT', 'ER', 'EX') and ACT_TRANSACTION_XREF_ID is null)) AND TRANSACTION_DATE >= :SIMULATION_START_DATE and TRANSACTION_DATE < :SIMULATION_END_DATE AND(SELECT PARAMETER_VALUE from T_SYS_CONFIG_DEFAULT where PARAMETER_NAME = 'MOMENT_ITEM_NUMBER_TYPE') = T_ACT_TRANSACTION_DETAIL.ITEM_NUMBER_TYPE_CODE AND {{PRODUCT_HIERARCHY}} {{AUDIENCE_QUERY}} {{OFFER_QUERY_GROUP_BY}} )

%22%2C%22drools%22%3A%22%22%2C%22collectionAttribute%22%3Afalse%2C%22refId%22%3A%22%22%7D%5D",
 "FormulaName": "SUM_QUALIFIED_ITEMS",

},

 "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}",

 "RuleEquationUI": "PurchaseTxn.ProgramCode == \"{{PROGRAMCODE}}\" && {{MOMENT_ELIGIBILITY_CRITERIA_PART}} && PurchaseTxn.TransactionDetails.EligibleRevenue >= 0 && PurchaseTxn.TransactionDetails.{{PRODUCT}} ",
 "MomentCap": [{{MAX_OFFERS_PER_MEMBER_TEMPLATE}}{{MAX_POINTS_PER_MEMBER_TEMPLATE}}{{MAX_POINTS_PER_TRANSACTION_TEMPLATE}}]
},

 }
 ]
},
"Status": "A",

}", "SimulationQueryTemplate": "SELECT
COUNT(distinct profile_id) AS unique_customers,
SUM(profile_trans) AS total_offers,
sum(eligible_revenue) as total_points,
ceil(SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_offers_per_day,
ceil(SUM(eligible_revenue)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_points_per_day,
ceil((SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}})*{{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_offers,
ceil((SUM(eligible_revenue)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}})*{{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_points
FROM
(

 {{OFFERS_QUERY}}
 FROM T_ACT_TRANSACTION
 INNER JOIN
 T_ACT_TRANSACTION_DETAIL
 ON T_ACT_TRANSACTION.ACT_TRANSACTION_ID = T_ACT_TRANSACTION_DETAIL.ACT_TRANSACTION_ID
 INNER JOIN T_PRODUCT_CATALOG_FLAT ON
 T_ACT_TRANSACTION_DETAIL.ITEM_NUMBER = T_PRODUCT_CATALOG_FLAT.{{ITEM_NUMBER}}
 WHERE T_ACT_TRANSACTION.PROGRAM_CODE = :ProgramCode AND T_ACT_TRANSACTION.STATUS IN('A','P') and(T_ACT_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE IN('PR', 'EP') OR(TRANSACTION_TYPE_CODE IN('RT', 'ER', 'EX') and ACT_TRANSACTION_XREF_ID is null))
 AND TRANSACTION_DATE >= :SIMULATION_START_DATE and TRANSACTION_DATE < :SIMULATION_END_DATE
 AND(SELECT PARAMETER_VALUE from T_SYS_CONFIG_DEFAULT where PARAMETER_NAME = 'MOMENT_ITEM_NUMBER_TYPE') = T_ACT_TRANSACTION_DETAIL.ITEM_NUMBER_TYPE_CODE
 AND {{PRODUCT_HIERARCHY}}
 {{AUDIENCE_QUERY}}
 {{OFFER_QUERY_GROUP_BY}}

SELECT COUNT(distinct profile_id) AS unique_customers, SUM(profile_trans) AS total_offers, SUM(profile_points) AS total_points, ceil(SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_offers_per_day, ceil(SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_points_per_day, ceil((SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_offers, ceil((SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_points FROM ( SELECT profile_id, {{OFFERS_QUERY}} FROM t_act_transaction WHERE program_code = :ProgramCode AND status IN ('A','P') AND transaction_type_code IN ('PR','EP','RT','ER','EX') AND act_transaction_xref_id is null AND transaction_date >= :SIMULATION_START_DATE AND transaction_date < :SIMULATION_END_DATE AND eligible_revenue >= {{MIN_TXN_AMT}} {{AUDIENCE_QUERY}} GROUP BY PROFILE_ID )

} ", "SimulationQueryTemplate": "SELECT COUNT(distinct profile_id) AS unique_customers, SUM(profile_trans) AS total_offers, SUM(profile_points) AS total_points,
ceil(SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_offers_per_day,
ceil(SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_points_per_day,
ceil((SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_offers,
ceil((SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_points
FROM
(
SELECT profile_id,
{{OFFERS_QUERY}}
FROM t_act_transaction
WHERE program_code = :ProgramCode AND status IN ('A','P') AND transaction_type_code IN ('PR','EP','RT','ER','EX') AND act_transaction_xref_id is null
AND transaction_date >= :SIMULATION_START_DATE AND transaction_date < :SIMULATION_END_DATE AND eligible_revenue >= {{MIN_TXN_AMT}}
{{AUDIENCE_QUERY}}
GROUP BY PROFILE_ID
